title: MAFS' Susie Bradley CONFIRMS split with NRL bad boy Todd Carney
text:
Married At First Sight star Susie Bradley has confirmed her split from NRL bad boy Todd Carney after just eight months of dating.

In a video shared to Instagram on Monday, the 27-year-old cosmetic nurse said the past few days had been 'a bit s**t' but she was trying to stay positive.

Break-up rumours began swirling on Saturday, when fans noticed the couple had deleted all photos of each other from social media.

The dream is over! Married At First Sight star Susie Bradley has confirmed her split from NRL bad boy Todd Carney after just eight months of dating. Pictured in Jimboomba on Monday

While taking a stroll near her home in Jimboomba, Queensland, Susie directly addressed her recent split.

'Just a little bit of an update on me. So it's been a bit s**t but all is okay... I'm throwing myself into work and, to be honest, I get a lot of pleasure from my work,' she said.

'I really, really, really love meeting people, talking about their lives, talking about my life and making friends. Making friends is like my favourite thing to do.

Moving on: In a video shared to Instagram on Monday, the 27-year-old cosmetic nurse said the past few days had been 'a bit s**t' but she was trying to stay positive

End of the road: Over the weekend, Susie and Todd (left) unfollowed each other on Instagram and removed all traces of their relationship from their respective accounts

'So basically I just want to say all my energies and efforts will now be focused on my daughter and my business.'

She concluded: 'If you have been thinking about making an appointment or coming to see me, now is definitely the time.'

Over the weekend, Susie and Todd unfollowed each other on Instagram and removed all traces of their relationship from their respective accounts.

'Whoops': On Saturday night, Susie uploaded a video of herself pouring a glass of wine

Worrying: She later shared a meme, which read: 'Wine won't wake up one day and leave you'

Susie also shared a cryptic post, which read: 'Letting go doesn't mean giving up, but rather accepting that there are things that cannot be.'

She later uploaded a video of herself pouring a glass of wine, as well as a meme which read: 'Wine won't wake up one day and leave you.'

Meanwhile, Todd drowned his sorrows on a boys' night out on Saturday.

'Because I'm happy': Meanwhile, Todd drowned his sorrows on a boys' night out on Saturday

Todd, 33, and Susie had been dating for eight months, during which time the rugby league star took on a stepfather role to Susie's four-year-old daughter, Baby.

Their relationship became public knowledge when Susie was still a participant on Channel Nine reality show Married At First Sight.

She was paired with barista Billy Vincent on the controversial social experiment.

Stepdad: Todd and Susie had been dating for eight months, during which time the rugby league star took on a stepfather role to Susie's four-year-old daughter, Baby (pictured)
description: Married At First Sight star Susie Bradley has confirmed her split from NRL bad boy Todd Carney after just eight months of dating.
authors: Jo Scrimshire For Daily Mail Australia
